item.title: Star Spangled Banner Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Em, Am, E7, HI D7, G, G7, F, A7, Abº7
As performed by The United States Navy Band
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/1ffZ8cFz6Bw
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Star Spangled Banner Lyric Based Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Created with letter names so any non-transposing instrument can play along. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Em, Am, E7, HI D7, G, G7, F, A7, Abº7
As performed by The United States Navy Band
I'm trying a different approach with these videos, using images from another app rather than recreating a chord chart. What do you think (leave a comment!)?
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/1ffZ8cFz6Bw
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Lyrics created using SongSheet Pro and edited with Artstudio Pro. The motion background is from motionbolt.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Star Spangled Banner Baritone Ukulele Play Along (In C)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Em, Am, E7, HI D7, G, G7, F, A7, Abº7
As performed by The United States Navy Band
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/1ffZ8cFz6Bw
I didn't intend to make this version in C, but just decided to do it anyway.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com.
